section_title: Recited enactment to apply to all citations, services, &c.
section_text: 1 The enactment herein-before recited does and shall apply to all citations on all summonses, and to all cases whatsoever of services and execution, and more than one witness is not and shall not be required for service or execution in any case,  excepting only in cases of poinding as aforesaid .
